coreAtributes.authorTag: On the inside of the left thigh panel, faint rubberised ink reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's riot belt
coreAtributes.description: A heavy duty belt with a codpiece and a set of ballistic fibre thigh panels attached to it. The odd shape of the thigh panels come from the metallic inserts in them.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(buckle)] the riot belt up around [npc.her] waist and [npc.verb(adjust)] the thigh panels and codpiece until they're comfortable.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(buckle)] the riot belt up around [npc2.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.her] [npc2.verb(adjust)] the thigh panels and codpiece until they're comfortable.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the riot belt around [npc2.namePos] waist and hastily [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc.her] riot belt before unbuckling it.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc2.namePos] riot belt before unbuckling it.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] at the straps on [npc2.namePos] riot belt before unbuckling it and tossing them aside.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the codpiece on [npc.her] riot belt back down and [npc.verb(tighten)] the adjustment straps.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the codpiece on [npc.her] riot belt back down and [npc.verb(tighten)] the adjustment straps.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(flip)] the codpiece on [npc.her] riot belt back down and roughly [npc.verb(tighten)] the adjustment straps.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the codpiece on [npc.her] riot belt before lifting it up.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the codpiece on [npc2.namePos] riot belt before lifting it up.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tug)] at the codpiece on [npc2.namePos] riot belt until it's loose enough before flipping it up.
